mapper.select: SELECT NOTI_ETPR_CODE, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_DATE, NOTI_RDCNT, NOTI_CTGRY_ICON_FILE_STRE_NM, COMMON_CODE_NOTI_KIND FROM NOTI WHERE COMMON_CODE_NOTI_KIND = 'NOTI020' ORDER BY CASE WHEN NOTI_CTGRY_ICON_FILE_STRE_NM = 'important.png' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, LENGTH(NOTI_ETPR_CODE) DESC, NOTI_ETPR_CODE DESC

SELECT NOTI_ETPR_CODE, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_DATE, NOTI_RDCNT, NOTI_CTGRY_ICON_FILE_STRE_NM, COMMON_CODE_NOTI_KIND FROM NOTI WHERE COMMON_CODE_NOTI_KIND = 'NOTI020'
AND ( NOTI_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY CASE WHEN NOTI_CTGRY_ICON_FILE_STRE_NM = 'important.png' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
NOTI_DATE ${sortBy}
SELECT NOTI_ETPR_CODE, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_DATE, NOTI_RDCNT, NOTI_CTGRY_ICON_FILE_STRE_NM, COMMON_CODE_NOTI_KIND FROM NOTI WHERE NOTI_ETPR_CODE = #{notiEtprCode}

SELECT UPLOAD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_SN, UPLOAD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE, UPLOAD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, UPLOAD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM, UPLOAD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE, UPLOAD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_RGSDE FROM NOTI LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE ON NOTI.NOTI_ETPR_CODE = UPLOAD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE NOTI.NOTI_ETPR_CODE = #{notiEtprCode}
SELECT UPLOAD_FILE_SN, UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE, UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE, UPLOAD_FILE_RGSDE FROM UPLOAD_FILE WHERE UPLOAD_FILE_SN = #{uploadFileSn}

SELECT UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM, E.EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM, E.EMPL_TELNO, E.EMPL_EMAIL, E.EMPL_ENCPN, E.EMPL_BRTHDY, E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT, E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF, E.COMMON_CODE_HFFC_STTUS FROM UPLOAD_FILE UF JOIN PROFL P ON UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE = P.PROFL_ETPR_CODE JOIN EMPL E ON P.PROFL_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID WHERE E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{depCode} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF, 5)), E.EMPL_ENCPN ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NTCN ( NTCN_SN, NTCN_EMPL_ID, NTCN_CN, NTCN_DATE, COMMON_CODE_NTCN_KIND) VALUES ( NOTI_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ntcnEmplId}, #{ntcnCn}, sysdate, #{commonCodeNtcnKind})
